name: Sabotage (V)
Lore: 'Poorly equipped Rebels must rely on clandestine strikes against the massive Imperial military. Computer ''slicing'' and system tampering have proven most effective.',
Text: 'Target an opponent''s device or non-superlaser weapon card. Draw destiny. Target lost if destiny -X < target''s destiny number, where X = the number of your spies on table. OR Cancel the targeting of a [Permanent Weapon] weapon at same site as your spy.',
